data.name: Hunt of the Reptorians
data.detailed_description:
Build a deck to captain your starship. Carve apart enemy ships chunk by chunk. Design your ship to fit your play style and adapt to enemy strategies. Duck and hide from the reptilian beasts while you build up your fleet's strength to reclaim Earth.


Deck building. Collect cards and refine/upgrade your deck to control your starship. Here are some to give you a taste:
  • Attack the enemy with projectiles and torpedoes. Some move fast and some take at least a turn to reach the enemy (if they're not shot down first)
  • Evade enemy attacks
  • Boost shields
  • Extinguish ship fires
  • Improve your targeting and scramble the enemy's
  • All sorts of other strange and wonderful effects to combine together in inventive ways


Dynamically carve up enemy ships. When attacking, you can take aim at the enemy ship and smash it up from the outside in. Find weak spots and disable parts of the ship strategically.

Design your own ship. Decide whether your ship will be bristling with guns, fast and nippy or slow and tough.

Recapture Earth. Captain the flagship of what's left of Earth's fleet after the Reptorians came. You start out weak and hunted. But you will build up your strength and eventually become the hunters and liberate Earth.

Recommended:

  • Processor: Core i5
